Emerald Tutu Job Posting!

Responsibilities:
- Assist with prototype development from design to fabrication to deployment
- Assist with experimental design for project components including biomatter 

- Prototypes: from fabrication to deployment
- modules, anchors, interconnections, platforms / ersatz for properties-over-time
- experiment design: biomatter growth, material durability, module performance, etc
- material scaling analysis, simulation type tailoring, packing for shipping, etc
- Material research and sourcing for all aspects of prototyping and modeling
- General management and tracking of project development
- Representation of research findings in written form, as well as diagrams and other graphics
- Work on company materials such as reports, promotional material, etc
- Miscellaneous video/motion graphics work for website
- Miscellaneous tasks based on current progress and status
- Travel and site-based assembly, delivery, fabrication, logistics, management, etc

subtitle.markdown:
### ABOUT THE POSITION
The Emerald Tutu is seeking to add a passionate, versatile worker to our team who is interested in engineering with plants and coastal infrastructure, and who is not afraid to get their hands dirty. The position will primarily involve building prototypes and material work, running experiments, analyzing results, and representing/demonstrating conclusions and project narratives. Additional responsibilities will vary widely, and we are seeking someone who is equally comfortable figuring things out with physical prototyping and coding for numerical modeling, for example—rising to the occasion to drive the project forward. Work is in person in Cambridge and East Boston.

### QUALIFICATIONS 
Applicants should have some experience in the Marine Sciences including, but not limited to, the following:

- Marine/wetland ecology
- Behavioral ecology
- Coastal engineering 
- Coastal resilience planning
- Oceanography
- Biogeochemistry

Other beneficial skills:

- Numerical/computational modeling experience
- Supply chain/production experience
- Hands-on fabrication experience
- Community organizing (english, español)
- Business development

These experience types and skills can be learned—they are secondary in importance to passion for ecological engineering and a hands-on DIY approach. QTBIPOC especially encouraged to apply.

### TERMS

- Duration: Seeking ~2 years 
- Start: Early 2023
- Salary: Commensurate with experience
- To apply: Send email with introduction and expression of interest to emerald.tutu@gmail.com
